subject: Technology
title: PlayStation: Sony Enters the Ring
description: Learn PlayStation: Sony Enters the Ring in one minute.

hook.text: The PlayStation was born from a betrayal. Sony and Nintendo were building a console together. Then Nintendo backed out.

buildup.text: Humiliated, Sony decided to build its own console. Nintendo had just created its fiercest competitor.

discovery.text: The PlayStation used CDs instead of cartridges. Games were cheaper to produce and could hold more data.

twist.text: Sony marketed to adults with edgy games like Tomb Raider and Final Fantasy VII. Gaming grew up.

climax.text: PlayStation sold over 100 million units. Sony transformed from electronics maker to gaming giant.

punchline.text: Nintendo's betrayal created its greatest rival.

quiz.question: Why did Sony create the PlayStation?
options: They always planned to enter gaming
Nintendo backed out of a joint console deal
